Name: Flowing Flame
Title: Diluc: Flowing Flame
Desc: A simple way out of perilous situations.
Source: Reward for inviting Diluc to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Flowing Flame
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1301]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1301] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13012]</color> once.
When your $[A1301], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S13012]</color> for the second and third times in one Round, spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Die</color>.
(You must have $[A1301] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
